Story:

A rich bastard hired you to get back some money a shaman ripped off from him. When you go to collect the money, the shaman puts a curse on you and a spell on his newly bought mansion. You realize that the only way to break the curse was to kill the shaman so you enter his mansion and start your journey on killing the bastard.

Controls:

WASD keys- Movement
Mouse- Aiming
LeftClick- Shoot/Melee
